meanings.definition: Affected with dropsy; swollen with an excessive accumulation of fluid.
meanings.sent1: The dropsical man's legs were so swollen that he could barely walk.
meanings.sent2: Her dropsical ankles made it challenging for her to wear shoes comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The dropsical balloon looked like it might burst at any moment.
meanings.sent4: The dropsical clouds loomed heavy in the sky, threatening rain.
meanings.sent5: The dropsical watermelon was so full of juice that it almost burst open.
